metering: Real-time evaluative metering using CMOS image sensor
dustreduction: Anti-static coating on sensor surfaces, Software based dust-removal (camera maps dust, removed later)

whitebalancing: Auto / Daylight / Shade / Cloudy / Tungsten / White Fluorescent Light / Flash / Custom
